514.title: Bubble Trouble Guide
514.author: Anonymous
514.description: A guide to the game of Bubble Trouble. Nothing on a, shall we say, level by level basis, but a solid guide nontheless. The Bubble Trouble Guide even tells you what mindset you should be in while playing the game.

515.title: Bubble Trouble Fusion
515.author: Anonymous
515.description:
This is a must-download for ALL Metroid fans!

Pirahna = Skultera
Eel = X Parasite
Shark = Blinky-X
Starfish = Metroid

512.title: btedit.sit
512.author: Anonymous
512.description: A fully graphical editor for use with the Ambrosia game Bubble Trouble, allowing you to edit the original levels or construct your own.

510.title: ambrosiagames
510.author: Anonymous
510.description: This is a file I made with all the games you need in one, to save you the hassle of trying to get all your favorites. if there is a bug you just email me at davidlewis@speedchoice.com.

511.title: BT Template.sit
511.author: Anonymous
511.description: This is a template for Bubble Trouble's LEVL resource, found in the BT Levels file. It allows you to edit the attibutes of a level including some things that can't be done with the BT Editor. It is currently incomplete, (there are some fields that I don't know what they do), but if you manage to complete it further then please feel free to post an updated copy. Includes documentation.

513.title: BTHQMus1
513.author: Anonymous
513.description: This is the High Quality Music Option 1 from Bubble Trouble Classic, converted into MIDI format. Some fo the quality has been lost, and the volumes and panning still need work, but it should be a passable conversion. Converted by Knucklehead.
